q1: This would be a good team to play against
a1: Agreed. Especially in the Maradona days!
a2: They would still be a great team to play against. Time does not change anything!
q3: Don't you think that Messi's best days are behind him?
a3: Yes, he is sadly getting older.

a4: Yes he was at international level
a5: In the Argentine selection players like: Dybala, Di Maria among other players play
